TestDescription.name: Apache Axis2 web services enumeration
TestDescription.Description: Apache Axis2 is installed on this application server. By accessing a specific URL ([dark]/services/listServices[/dark]) it's possible to list all the available web services deployed in this server.
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker can enumerate the available web services deployed in this server.
TestDescription.Recommendation: If you don't want these services to be publicly available you need to restrict access to the [dark]/services/listServices[/dark] URL.
